description:
Storyboarding is crucial any time you're telling a story. This could be for a movie, a video game, a marketing piece or any time you need to get your point across.

This course takes teaches you the basics of how a great storyboard works, and how to create one in real life. You will learn both the concepts of great storyboarding and the technical side in one course.

A set of source files and images are included in this course.
title: Storyboarding Layout and Design
